text: aur kahane lage jis cheez kee taraph tum hamen bulaate ho usase to hamaare dil pardon mein hain (ki dil ko nahin lagatee) aur hamaare kaanon mein girdaanee (baharaapan hai) ki kuchh sunaayee nahin deta aur hamaare tumhaare daramiyaan ek parda (haayal) hai to tum (apana) kaam karo ham (apana) kaam karate hain
